name: Lunar Sorcery
description: The magic of the moon flows through you, waxing and waning with its phases.

1.name: Lunar Embodiment
1.description: Gain phase-based spells that don't count against spells known and cast a 1st-level phase spell once per long rest; choose a phase after each long rest.

1.name: Moon Fire
1.description: Learn sacred flame; when casting it you may target two creatures within 5 feet of each other.

6.name: Lunar Boons
6.description: Metamagic on spells from schools tied to your current phase costs 1 fewer sorcery point a number of times per long rest equal to your proficiency bonus.

6.name: Waxing and Waning
6.description: As a bonus action, spend 1 sorcery point to change your phase and cast each phase's 1st-level spell once per long rest when in that phase.

14.name: Lunar Empowerment
14.description: Each phase grants an additional benefit: Full Moon sheds light and grants perception bonuses; New Moon grants stealth and imposes disadvantage on attacks; Crescent Moon grants resistance to necrotic and radiant damage.

18.name: Lunar Phenomenon
18.description: Bonus action to unleash a phase power such as blinding light, necrotic gloom, or teleportation; usable once per long rest or by spending 5 sorcery points.
